Text.Value: Show me you at least still know your true purpose.
Always a pleasure to see old acquaintances. But you would be wise to not interfere in what is to come.

EditorData.NodeContext: A little bittersweet, before hardening into a warning. Addressed to Minsc and/or Jaheira (old companions of hers from earlier games, shocked to see her again).

Text.Value: My mission brought me here.
Get out of my head.
Look at me, girl.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and looms over Shadowheart. They reach towards the hood to lower it...

Text.Value: Before me, you had no purpose in this world.
My purpose... You mean the artefact.
Do not feign ignorance with me - I know exactly what memories were left to rattle around that foolish head of yours.
There it is. You see? You know more than you realise. You know all that you needed to, in order to do as I commanded.
You had a mission, but did you succeed? Or did you stray? I sense delusion in you, girl; ambition that far outpaces your mettle.
Good. There is still some discipline to be found in that head of yours. The artefact, indeed.
The artefact is all that matters. Do you remember who sent you to retrieve it?
And to think you were honoured with the name Shadowheart.
The artefact. That's what you want to hear about, isn't it?
The artefact doesn't matter anymore. Not to me.
The artefact. It is all that matters. Do you remember who sent you to retrieve it?
Loss is a gift. Do you still not understand? Clearly freedom has eroded my teachings.
Do you know why you are here?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: A hooded figure appears from the shadows and sits next to Shadowheart.

Text.Value: I'm here for the Mapping of the Heart. I wish to be Unburdened.
That voice... Do I know you?
This can be remedied - if there is anything left of you that is worth saving.
How unsophisticated of you, girl. Could you have not at least attempted a lie? You always did possess a stubborn streak.
For the Mapping of the Heart. I wish to be Unburdened.
Show me you have not strayed too far, girl. Show me that you still know your true purpose.
You can. I made it so. But allow me to jog your memory...
Stupid girl. Do you think I'd linger in there if I had a choice? Wading through your broken, childish memories?
Enough of this - who are you?
That she did. Look at me, girl.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The hooded figure stands and looms over Shadowheart. They reach towards the hood to lower it...

Text.Value: The Mother Superior sent me.
Why map what is already known all too well? I know you, girl. You possess a conniving heart, a disloyal heart, a questioning heart.
My Mother Superior sent me.
None of your concern.
I can't remember.
I want my lost memories restored.
What matters to you is but a grain of sand lost at the bottom of the deepest, darkest sea.
More than you realise, girl. All you know comes from my tutelage. Before me, you were... you were of a very different stripe.
Your purpose is the artefact. It is all that matters. Do you even remember who sent you to retrieve it?
I know you remember me - your eyes cannot lie. I am Viconia DeVir. Your Mother Superior. Your tutor in Lady Shar's sacred arts.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart's eyes widen as the figure lowers their cowl off-screen. We then see who is revealed - a drow woman. Ageless, elegant, silver-haired. Viconia DeVir.

Text.Value: You at least still recall the title of your better. Good. Perhaps you can be brought to heel yet.
That voice... Do I know you?
Do you know why you are here?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: A hooded figure appears from the shadows and sits next to Shadowheart.

EditorData.stateContext: Shadowheart is seated on a stone bench

Text.Value: All in good time. Remember - lil alurl velve zhah lil velkyn uss...

EditorData.NodeContext: A drow saying, meaning 'the best knife is the unseen one' Pronounced 'lill AL-url VEH-elv zah lill VEL-kin uss'

Text.Value: You. Boo would have recognised your foul stench, had you not defiled his nose with evil Sharran incense!

EditorData.NodeContext: Low, indignant - seeing Viconia DeVir again for the first time in years

Text.Value: Do you remember who sent you to retrieve it?

EditorData.stateContext: Shadowheart is seated on a stone bench

Text.Value: *That phrase - the drow dialect. 'The best knife is the unseen one.' You know it. You've heard it many times, you're sure.*
My life was taken from me. I want it back.
I don't know what you mean. My memories are incomplete.
*You sense a presence exploring your mind. Feather-light, yet strong and cunning. She is casting Detect Thoughts on you.*
*That voice - it's oddly familiar to you. But why?*

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart looks slightly confused/surprised on hearing the voice.

Text.Value: Viconia DeVir. If only Shar would bless me with the forgetting of your face.

EditorData.NodeContext: Response to Viconia's grand reveal. Viconia and Jaheira are legacy characters with a fractious relationship - it often flares up to outright hatred, but is right now sitting at distaste. The emphasis here is in reference to Shadowheart's memories of Viconia having been erased.

Text.Value: Welcome home. Now descend to me - you have much to answer for.
It was you, wasn't it? You sent me.

EditorData.stateContext: Hooded figure is standing before Shadowheart, who is seated on a stone bench.
Shadowheart and a hooded figure sit next to each other on a stone bench facing the opposite direction, intentionally avoiding eyecontact.

Synopsis: Shadowheart meets with Viconia who is still hooded. However Viconia soon reveals who she is and invites Shadowheart to speak down below in the Grotto.
